com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy
Class Zombie.Configuration

java.lang.Object
  com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy.Zombie.Configuration
Enclosing class:
Zombie
public abstract static class Zombie.Configuration
extends Object

The default configuration which is used for endpoint request execution. The configured properties pertain to the Apache HTTP Components library which provides the foundation for network communication.

Configurations can be revised for each Endpoint using @Config by specifying the Class of a Config extension. Simply override the required template methods and provide a new instance of the desired property. For example, override Config#httpClient() to return a custom HttpClient which might be configured with alternative Schemes, timeouts ..etc.

For more information on configuring your own instance of HttpClient refer the Apache HC Tutorial.

Note that all extensions must expose a default non-parameterized constructor.

Since:
1.3.0

Version:
1.2.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe

Constructor Detail

Zombie.Configuration

public Zombie.Configuration()
Method Detail

httpClient

public org.apache.http.client.HttpClient httpClient()

The out-of-the-box configuration for an instance of HttpClient which will be used for executing all endpoint requests.

It registers two Schemes:

  1. HTTP on port 80 using sockets from PlainSocketFactory.getSocketFactory()
  2. HTTPS on port 443 using sockets from SSLSocketFactory.getSocketFactory()

It uses a ThreadSafeClientConnManager with the following parameters:

  1. Redirecting: enabled
  2. Connection Timeout: 30 seconds
  3. Socket Timeout: 30 seconds
  4. Socket Buffer Size: 12000 bytes
  5. User-Agent: via System.getProperty("http.agent")

Returns:
the instance of HttpClient which will be used for request execution

Throws:
ConfigurationFailedException - if the default configuration for the HttpClient failed to be instantiated

Since:
1.3.0

See Also:
Apache HC Tutorial
